name: part_008
file: tmp_【#鷹嶺ルイ1周年LIVE】Growth ーこれが私の成長ー【3D LIVE】 [y-gW-iI1eAo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performs the song 'Kikkake'. During the bridge, she transforms into the official Hololive Idol costume.
MC section where Takane Lui talks about the song performance and her new idol outfit.

subtitles.original: ふいに点滅し始め 急かすのかな
subtitles.english: Suddenly starting to blink, is it rushing me?

subtitles.original: いつの間にか少し 早歩きになってた
subtitles.english: Without realizing it, I've started walking a bit faster.

subtitles.original: 自分の意思 関係ないように
subtitles.english: As if my own will has nothing to do with it.

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もみんな 一斉に走り出す
subtitles.english: Everyone, one and all, starts running at once.

subtitles.original: 何に追われ焦るのかと笑う
subtitles.english: I laugh, wondering what they're being chased by to be in such a hurry.

subtitles.original: 客観的に見てる私が 嫌いだ
subtitles.english: I hate myself for watching so objectively.

subtitles.original: 決心のきっかけは 理屈ではなくて
subtitles.english: The motivation for a decision isn't logic.

subtitles.original: いつだってこの胸の衝動から始まる
subtitles.english: It always starts from an impulse in my chest.

subtitles.original: 流されてしまうこと 抵抗しながら
subtitles.english: While resisting being swept away...

subtitles.original: 生きるとは選択肢 たった一つを選ぶこと
subtitles.english: To live is to choose just one option.

subtitles.original: 横断歩道 渡っていつも思う
subtitles.english: I always think while crossing the crosswalk.

subtitles.original: こんな風に心に信号があればいい
subtitles.english: I wish there were traffic lights in the heart like this.

subtitles.original: 進みなさい それから 止まりなさい
subtitles.english: "Go ahead," and then, "Stop."

subtitles.original: それがルールならば 悩まずに行けるけれど…
subtitles.english: If those were the rules, I could go without worrying, but...

subtitles.original: 誰かの指示 待ち続けたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to keep waiting for someone's instructions.

subtitles.original: 走りたい時に 自分で踏み出せる
subtitles.english: To be able to step out on my own when I want to run.

subtitles.original: 強い意志を持った人でいたい
subtitles.english: I want to be a person with a strong will.

subtitles.original: もう一人の明日の私を 探そう
subtitles.english: Let's find the another me of tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 決心のきっかけは 時間切れじゃなくて
subtitles.english: The motivation for a decision isn't running out of time.

subtitles.original: 考えたその上で未来を信じること
subtitles.english: It's about believing in the future after thinking it through.

subtitles.original: 後悔はしたくない 思ったそのまま
subtitles.english: I don't want to have regrets, just as I thought.

subtitles.original: 正解はわからない たった一度の人生だ
subtitles.english: I don't know the right answer, it's my only life.

subtitles.original: ほら人ごみの誰かが走り出す
subtitles.english: Look, someone in the crowd starts running.

subtitles.original: 釣られたみたいにみんなが走り出す
subtitles.english: As if lured, everyone starts running.

subtitles.original: 自分のこと 自分で決められず
subtitles.english: Unable to decide my own matters for myself,

subtitles.original: 背中を押すもの 欲しいんだ
subtitles.english: I want something to push me forward.

subtitles.original: きっかけ
subtitles.english: Motivation.

subtitles.original: 決心のきっかけは 理屈ではなくて
subtitles.english: The motivation for a decision isn't logic.

subtitles.original: いつだってこの胸の衝動から始まる
subtitles.english: It always starts from an impulse in my chest.

subtitles.original: 流されてしまうこと 抵抗しながら
subtitles.english: While resisting being swept away...

subtitles.original: 生きるとは選択肢 たった一つを選ぶこと
subtitles.english: To live is to choose just one option.

subtitles.original: 決心は自分から 思ったそのまま…
subtitles.english: The decision comes from within, just as I thought...

subtitles.original: 生きよう
subtitles.english: Let's live.

subtitles.original: はい。ということで、「きっかけ」聴いていただきました。
subtitles.english: Okay. And with that, you've heard "Kikkake".

subtitles.original: 「きっかけ」の途中に…
subtitles.english: In the middle of "Kikkake"...

subtitles.original: わあ、なんと！憧れのホロライブのアイドル衣装をいただくことができ、着させていただきました。
subtitles.english: Wow, look! I was able to receive the Hololive idol costume I admired, and I've put it on.

subtitles.original: どう？どう？似合う？
subtitles.english: How is it? Does it suit me?

subtitles.original: 似合う？可愛い？
subtitles.english: Does it look good? Is it cute?

subtitles.original: 自分でもね、似合うかなって、凄く不安だったんだけれども…
subtitles.english: I was actually really worried whether it would suit me, but...
